mdRecord.dcterms:title: U.S. Army nurse's coat from World War II
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This coat was worn by Ruth Beery, chief nurse of the U.S. Army 8th Evacuation Hospital unit, during World War II. It is a long, olive green coat, size 14R; tag: Mfg'd for governmental use only under patent Nos. Re. 21676 & 2198064.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Uniforms
World War, 1939-1945
United States. Army. Evacuation Hospital, 8th
